quizName: Azure AI Engineer Associate AI-102 Quiz 2
question: The Key Phrase Extraction service uses either C# or Python. If Python is used for the extraction service, which language will the response be returned in?
explanation:
Regardless of the programming language you use, the Key Phrase Extraction service response is always returned in JSON format.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/search/cognitive-search-skill-keyphrases
